_xResult.title: Dimes Aren't Dozen - Custom Made Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made patterned trench coat with two side pockets
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made coat is a dreamy spectacle in every way. We love the jacquard fabric in a subtle print that contrasts with the orange whimsical paneling print. The three buttons on the front are carved wood and beautifully crafted. You will certainly be the only one in a trench coat like this! Warm, lovely, stylish, unique.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
